mapper.select: select t.id as relId, t.class_room_name as relName, case when (select count(c.id) from T_XG_MAINTENANCE_RELATION c,T_JW_CLASSROOM r where c.mt_flag='0' and r.id = c.rel_id and t.id = r.id and c.valid_flag='1' ) = 0 then '已维护' else '未维护' end mtStatus from T_JW_CLASSROOM t left join T_XG_MAINTENANCE_RELATION mr on t.id = mr.rel_id group by t.id, class_room_name order by mtStatus

select d.id as relId, d.dorm_name as relName, case when (select count(c.id) from T_XG_MAINTENANCE_RELATION c,T_JW_DORM r where c.mt_flag='0' and r.id = c.rel_id and d.id = r.id and c.valid_flag='1') = 0 then '已维护' else '未维护' end mtStatus from T_JW_DORM d left join T_XG_MAINTENANCE_RELATION mr on d.id = mr.rel_id group by d.id, dorm_name order by mtStatus
select t.*, GOOD_NUM*UNIT_PRICE as goodPrice from T_XG_MAINTENANCE_RELATION t where valid_flag = '1' and id = #{id}
